name: GhostShore with a bulb
description:
you re a bulb

                                                                          travel from light to light                             met ghost?

             you're light is a help in these shore

                    cold or hot- you can stabilize feels

help   them

Controls : ARROW (up down left right) and SPACE are the key needed.

If you're stuck, press R to come back to the first lantern. Home is never far away.

Made for the ludum dare 49 in 3 days, with whale noise

Sound design and music by Choucroute#1290.
